doc:
John Arledge https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Arledge 0 Johnson Lundy Arledge (March 12, 1906 – May 15, 1947) was an American film and stage actor. He played dozens of supporting roles in the Hollywood movies of the 1930s–1940s, including the tractor driver who destroys a house in The Grapes of Wrath. Johnson_Lundy_Arledge ( March_12_,_1906 – May_15_,_1947 ) was an_American_film_and_stage_actor . He played dozens of supporting roles in the_Hollywood_movies of the_1930s – 1940s , including the_tractor_driver who destroys a_house in The_Grapes of Wrath .
